  • Constructor Details

    • FaithTrack

      public FaithTrack​(java.lang.String filePath)
      Initializes the FaithTrack object from a json config file
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path of the json file to load

  • Method Details

    • checkStatus

      public void checkStatus​(Game game, int position)
      Check if position is a popeSpace, if so get the section of that space. From game, get all the players and activate that section pope card if they are inside of it, remove otherwise.

      Check if position reached the end of the faithtrack and flag the game for game ending.

      Parameters:
      game - The current game
      position - The position to check

    • getTrackLength

      public int getTrackLength()

    • popeSpace

      public int popeSpace​(int space)
      Parameters:
      space - The number of the cell
      Returns:
      The number of the vatican section the pope space is in, otherwise -1 if the cell isn't a pope space

    • isXSectionOrHigher

      public boolean isXSectionOrHigher​(int sectionX, int space)
      This method will be used when player reaches a pope space, and other players will have to set the state of a pope card based on the section they're in.
      Parameters:
      sectionX - The vatican section starting from 0
      space - The number of the cell to be checked
      Returns:
      The number of the last section that the player has passed, or -1 if he hasn't still passed a section

    • getVp

      public int getVp​(int space)

    • getStartOfVaticanSectionsCopy

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getStartOfVaticanSectionsCopy()
